result.title: Searching for University in North America with full scholarship
result.content:
Hi all,

I am sylap97 and sorry for hiding it before.

So I am looking for some university in North America (esp, USA and Canada) that will accept me with full scholarship.

Maybe, first of all, I should tell you a bit about me.

I will be 17 this November. As education system here in my country is 11 years only, I will be graduating next summer (June 2015). So I think it is time to worry about my university life.

I have bronze medal at IZhO 2014 (International Zhautykov Olympiad), silver medal at APIO 2014 and 2nd place in National OI 2013, no place this year at National OI. I participated in IOI twice (2013, 2014), but I didn't manage to get some medal so far.

I recently became master in Codeforces. I usually don't participate in TC SRMs. I participated in only 5 SRMs. In my first SRM I became yellow. But currently I am blue.

I want to know what my chances to get full scholarship from a good University in North America are in case I won't achieve anything notable in my last academic year at high school.

I will appreciate any reply/suggestion.

Thanks.
